title: Rejection & Appeal
description: Demonstrate how appeal workflows recover rejected loans.

steps.title: Rejection trigger
steps.description: System rejects application due to risk threshold breach.
steps.narration: Application slides into the rejection track with audit context.

steps.title: Appeal request
steps.description: Applicant submits appeal with supplemental docs.
steps.narration: The appeal form collects new evidence and explanation.

steps.title: Re-review with AI
steps.description: AI reevaluates new evidence and updates risk score.
steps.narration: Fresh analysis flows into the reconsideration queue.

steps.title: Final outcome
steps.description: Approver either reinstates or finalizes rejection.
steps.narration: Final decision gets logged and shared with the applicant.
